about_the_game:
Hop into Adventure: Discover "BUNNY"

"BUNNY" is a side-scrolling action game where Bunny and Smallbird embark on an adventure to find their friends. Control Bunny as you navigate through stages, overcoming obstacles and squeezing through walls. There's no game over, so everyone can play through to the end.

For the Busy You: Enjoy a Game Experience in Just 15 Minutes!

This game is perfect for those looking to enjoy a quick gaming experience, as it can be completed in just 15 minutes

Discover Friends Across 4 Unique Courses!

Each course consists of three engaging parts, offering a total of four unique courses to explore and enjoy.

Easy Controls: Perfect for Beginners!

It's easy to operate with just a stick and two buttons, making it accessible for even the youngest players to enjoy

Unlock New Fun After Completing the Game!

Once you clear the game, various bonus features and lighthearted scenes will be unlocked based on your points, so you can continue to enjoy the game even after clearing

name: BUNNY

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8265U CPU @ 1.60GHz 1.80 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)/Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
